import React from 'react'; import Home from './routes/Home' import UpdatePage from './routes/UpdatePage' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import { RecipesContextProvider } from './context/appContext' import "./App.css" import RecipeDetailPage from './routes/RecipeDetailPage'; import NavBar from './components/NavBar' import AddRecipes from './components/AddRecipes' const App = () => { return (
); } export default App;
